thread.title: Britney Spears spends Valentines at $30m Airbnb mansion
thread.title_full: Britney Spears spends Valentines at $30m Airbnb mansion | Daily Mail Online

author: Ross Mcdonagh For Dailymail.com
title: Britney Spears spends Valentines at $30m Airbnb mansion
text:
It is one of the most desired strips of real estate in America.
So Billionaire Beach is naturally where you'd find the likes of Britney Spears chilling with her family.
The 35-year-old gave a shout out to Airbnb on Valentine's Day after being hooked up with a stunning $30 million mansion on the exclusive Carbon Beach in Malibu.
'Family weekend getaway!': Britney Spears spendt Valentine's with her sons and boyfriend Sam Asghari at a $30 million Malibu mansion courtesy of Airbnb
Happy lady: Here the singer is seen standing by the pool that has an amazing view of the Pacific Ocean
'No photo can capture the beauty of a family weekend getaway in Malibu,' she wrote in an Instagram snap. 'Thanks @airbnb for the gift of this lovely home.'
In the breathtaking shot, the singer stands with arms raised in front of a beautiful infinity pool, overlooking a jaw-dropping sunset above the placid Pacific.
The popstar spent five days there with her two sons - 11-year-old Sean and 10-year-old Jayden - as well as her new boyfriend Sam Asghari.
The Mediterranean villa boasts four bedrooms, six bathrooms, a theatre room, bar, and outdoor TV and grill.
Cheers: 'No photo can capture the beauty of a family weekend getaway in Malibu,' she wrote in an Instagram snap. 'Thanks @airbnb for the gift of this lovely home.'
Wow: It has breath-taking views of the Pacific Ocean
Mod cons: It also has theatre room, bar, and outdoor TV and grill
Rich: It is located on the exclusive Carbon Beach in Malibu - AKA Billionaire Beach
It costs $6,500 per night â€” with a four night minimum, meaning the briefest stay will set a punter back $26,000.
Neighbours include Dr Dre, Dreamworks founder David Geffen, director Rob Reiner and former Dodgers CEO Jamie McCourt; Nobu owner and Oracle CEO Larry Ellison owns ten properties along the one mile stretch.
Courtney Cox and David Arquette meanwhile sold their Carbon Beach pad after they split for $33.5 million.
Ouch: The stunning home costs $6,500 per night
Bill: It has a four night minimum, meaning the briefest stay will set a punter back $26,000
Say hello: Neighbours include Dr Dre, Dreamworks founder David Geffen, director Rob Reiner and former Dodgers CEO Jamie McCourt
Big fan: Nobu owner and Oracle CEO Larry Ellison owns ten properties along the one mile stretch
Former neighbours: Courtney Cox and David Arquette meanwhile sold their Carbon Beach pad after they split for $33.5 million
Britney has been dating her Slumber Party music video co-star since November.
Britney has been catching up on some R&R after a stressful few weeks, taking a break from her planet Hollywood Vegas residency, and dealing with her eight-year-old niece Maddie's frightening ATV crash.
She also used Instagram to apparently take a passive swipe back at Katy Perry, who's 'I haven't shaved my head yet' comment on the Grammys red carpet didn't go down too well with fans.
'Her mouth speaks from that which fills her heart,' she wrote, tweaking the Luke 6:45 Bible Quote: , with a picture of a pair of hands forming a heart.
Vacay: The popstar spent five days there with her two sons - 11-year-old Sean and ten-year-old Jayden - as well as her hunky new boyfriend Sam
Hot couple: She has been dating her Slumber Party music video co-star since November
